entries.title: Shared Package Kurulumu
changes: Shared package.json guncellendi: name: @task-filewas/shared, main: dist/index.js, types: dist/index.d.ts
Dependencies eklendi: zod@3.24.2
DevDependencies eklendi: typescript@5.7.3
Shared tsconfig.json olusturuldu (strict mode, ES2022 target, declaration generation)
Shared src/index.ts olusturuldu (re-export pattern, zod export)
Shared src/types/index.ts olusturuldu (BaseEntity, ApiResponse, PaginatedResponse, status types, message types)
Shared src/schemas/index.ts olusturuldu (Zod schemas for validation - session, phase, agent, permission, thinking, model, message)
Shared src/utils/index.ts olusturuldu (generateId, formatDate, formatRelativeTime, sleep, retry, safeJsonParse, deepClone, isDefined, truncate)
npm install basariyla tamamlandi
npm run build:shared basariyla test edildi - dist klasoru olusturuldu

entries.title: TypeScript Base Config
changes: Root tsconfig.json olusturuldu (base config - strict: true, target: ES2022, moduleResolution: bundler)
Strict type checking ayarlari eklendi (noImplicitAny, strictNullChecks, noUnusedLocals, noUncheckedIndexedAccess, vb.)
ESNext module ve bundler moduleResolution ayarlandi
isolatedModules ve verbatimModuleSyntax ozellikleri aktif edildi
Shared tsconfig.json guncellendi (extends root, composite: true, declaration: true)
shared/src/index.ts zaten mevcut - zod re-export ve modul yapisi tanimli
npm run build basariyla test edildi - TypeScript derleme calisiyor

entries.title: Backend & Frontend TypeScript Config
changes: Backend tsconfig.json olusturuldu (module: NodeNext, moduleResolution: NodeNext)
Backend path alias eklendi: @shared/* -> ../shared/src/*
Backend project references eklendi (shared'a referans)
Frontend tsconfig.json olusturuldu (jsx: react-jsx, lib: DOM, DOM.Iterable)
Frontend path alias'lar eklendi: @/* -> ./src/*, @shared/* -> ../shared/src/*
Frontend vite/client types dahil edildi
Frontend project references eklendi (shared'a referans)
Frontend tsconfig.node.json olusturuldu (Vite config icin ayri tsconfig)
Shared tsconfig.json guncellendi (module: ESNext, bundler moduleResolution)
Tum workspace'lerde npx tsc --noEmit basariyla test edildi
npm run typecheck root komutlari basariyla calisti
